General.Name: GSP Resource Corp
General.Description: GSP Resource Corp. engages in the exploration of mineral properties in Canada. It primarily explores for copper, gold, silver, molybdenum, and palladium deposits. The company has an option to acquire a 100% interest in the Alwin project covering an area of 575 hectares located in Logan Lake, British Columbia; and the Olivine Mountain property that consists of an area of 3021.87 hectares situated in the Interior Plateau area of South-Central British Columbia. GSP Resource Corp. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 777 Dunsmuir Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7Y 1K4
